mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, PARENTID, PARENTFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, TOTALSALES, TOTALLISTINGS, SUCESSFULLISTING, BIDS, ITEMSSOLD, AVERAGEPRICE, SELLTHROUGH, RANK, NAME, SORT, ANTISTOP, DESCR, ANTISTOP1, ANTISTOP2, ANTISTOP3, ANTISTOP4, ANTISTOP5, REMARK from db_antistop where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, PARENTID, PARENTFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, TOTALSALES, TOTALLISTINGS, SUCESSFULLISTING, BIDS, ITEMSSOLD, AVERAGEPRICE, SELLTHROUGH, RANK, NAME, SORT, ANTISTOP, DESCR, ANTISTOP1, ANTISTOP2, ANTISTOP3, ANTISTOP4, ANTISTOP5, REMARK from db_antistop
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , PARENTID , PARENTFLAG , OPER , OPERTIME , CREATEOPER , CREATTIME , CORPID , OPENFLAG , TOTALSALES , TOTALLISTINGS , SUCESSFULLISTING , BIDS , ITEMSSOLD , AVERAGEPRICE , SELLTHROUGH , RANK , NAME , SORT , ANTISTOP , DESCR , ANTISTOP1 , ANTISTOP2 , ANTISTOP3 , ANTISTOP4 , ANTISTOP5 , REMARK

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PARENTFLAG = #{parentflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CREATTIME = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TOTALSALES = #{totalsales,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TOTALLISTINGS = #{totallistings,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SUCESSFULLISTING = #{sucessfullisting,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
BIDS = #{bids,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ITEMSSOLD = #{itemssold,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
AVERAGEPRICE = #{averageprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SELLTHROUGH = #{sellthrough,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ANTISTOP = #{antistop,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ANTISTOP1 = #{antistop1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ANTISTOP2 = #{antistop2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ANTISTOP3 = #{antistop3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ANTISTOP4 = #{antistop4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ANTISTOP5 = #{antistop5,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1

, 1=1
